short_description: bäckerei herr matthias klausmann is a bakery based in waldkirch, germany.
long_description: bäckermeister und inhaber der traditionsbäckerei am marktplatz, matthias klausmann, backt für sie mehr und mehr vollwert-produkte nach bio-richtlinien - kontrolliert und zertifiziert. zu den beliebtesten spezialitäten gehören die feinen "herre-beck laugenbrezeln", welche auf traditionelle weise noch direkt „auf" der herdplatte gebacken werden.
generated_description: bakery mr (bäckerei herr) is a bakery located in waldkirch, baden-württemberg. the bakery is known for its traditional, handcrafted baked goods made with high-quality ingredients. matthias klausmann, the master baker, emphasizes the use of organic principles in his products, which are certified and controlled. the bakery offers a wide range of baked goods, including breads, pastries, and seasonal specialties. notable items include the "herre-beck laugenbrezeln" and the linzer-torte. bäckerei herr caters to various events such as wine receptions, weddings, birthdays, and anniversaries, providing a diverse selection of party goods.
